sentences.sContent: The dog was biting, growling and wagging its tail.
sentences.sCn: 那条狗咬着叫着，还摇着尾巴。

sentences.sContent: ‘You naughty girl!’ Mom said, wagging her finger at me.
sentences.sCn: “你这个调皮的丫头！”妈妈对我摇了摇手指说道。

synos.tran: 摆动；喋喋不休；蹒跚而行

trans.tranOther: if a dog wags its tail, or if its tail wags, the dog moves its tail many times from one side to the other
